 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.heaton.bot

Interface Summary
ISpiderReportable This interface represents a class that the spider can report to.
IWorkloadStorable This interface defines a class that can be used to store a spider's workload.
 

Class Summary
Attribute The Attribute class stores a list of named value pairs.
AttributeList  
BotExclusion The bot exclusion class is used to read and process a robots.txt file from a web site.
ByteList  
CookieParse This class is used to parse cookies that are transmitted with the HTTP headers.
HTMLForm The HTMLForm class is used to create a response to an HTML form, and then transmit it to a web server.
HTMLPage The HTMLPage class is used to parse an HTML page and store that page, in a parsed form, in memory.
HTMLParse A VERY simple class meant only to subclass the HTMLEditorKit class to make the getParser method public so that we can gain access to an HTMLEditorKit.Parser object.
HTMLParser  
HTMLTag  
HTTP This class implements an HTTP handler.
HTTPSocket  
Link Very simple data class to hold HTML links.
Log The log class is used to write out log information.
Spider  
SpiderInternalWorkload This class is used to maintain an internal, memory based workload store for a spider.
SpiderSQLWorkload This class uses a JDBC database to store a spider workload.
SpiderWorker The SpiderWorker class performs the actual work of spidering pages.
URLUtility This simple static class contains several methods that are useful to manipulate URL's.
